author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a quick follow-up on PR to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39615. 
Title says it all, I reduce code duplication by moving similar classes to a template class and specialize them in the plugins.

#### PR validation:

relies on the implemented unit test: `scram b runtests_testAlignPCLThresholdsPayloadInspector`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: `AlignPCLThresholds_PayloadInspector`: reduce code duplication, move similar classes to a template and specialize them in the plugins
